species.name: unown
descriptions: Because different types of UNOWN exist, it is said that they must have a variety of abilities.
It is hard to believe these strangely shaped Pok√©mon are truly living creatures. I've pointed out that the species' many forms resemble writing from other lands; no one will take me seriously.
Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or Unown came first.
Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
